name: Virion (Occular Malice)
description:
Battle in a hostile environment for microscopic domination. Grow your organisms and become leader of the ecosystem.

This was a submission to The Messy Coders Invasion Game Jam February 2022. 

Engine

  • Unity 2020.3.29f1

Assets

  • GUI Pro Kit - Casual Game (Layer Lab)
  • SUIMONO Water System (Tanuki Digital)
  • Ultimate 10+ Shaders (The Developer)
  • Corals (Dmitriy Dryzhak)
  • Master Audio 2022 (Dark Tonic Inc.)
  • Music (Vertex Studio)
